comment.author: 16967530@N03
comment._content: This is another great composition, very interesting geometry with the angles of leaning timbers and roof lines reflected in the angles of the woman's upper body. Also the snow breaks up the picture into blocks, again leaning towards the abstract perhaps comparable to Eugene Atget's photographic tendencies?

comment.author: 88025703@N00
comment._content: Posed, I think.  But the people look pretty healthy and neat. Romanticized documentary, but a pleasure.
